Type.Name: ISymbolDocumentWriter

TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISymbolDocumentWriter

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

remarks.para: A document is defined by a URL and a document type GUID. Optionally, the document source can be stored in the symbol store.

block.para: This interface is the managed counterpart of the ISymUnmanagedDocumentWriter interface, which is one of the unmanaged symbol store interfaces that provide an alternate way to read and write debug symbol information.

summary.para: Represents a document referenced by a symbol store.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetCheckSum (Guid algorithmId, byte[] checkSum);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetCheckSum(valuetype System.Guid algorithmId, unsigned int8[] checkSum) cil managed

remarks.para: Sets the checksum for the document.

Docs.param: The GUID representing the algorithm ID.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetSource(unsigned int8[] source) cil managed

remarks.para: An array of unsigned bytes is used instead of character data to accommodate a wider variety of sources.

summary.para: Stores the raw source for a document in the symbol store.

Docs.param: The document source represented as unsigned bytes.
